title: Provide mesh models of outer Atlas casings

content.raw:
The Atlas model was recently to the as-built model. However the arm meshes are of the core mechanical structure. They do not contain casings that BDI added to cover the moving components. (The casings are embossed with "Boston Dynamics" in the attached figure)

Do you plan to add these to the Atlas model or has BDI provided them to you? On a recent call to BDI, they suggested that the casing meshes were available.
We wish to use these casings to determine forward kinematic error by comparing the casings to LIDAR returns.

(This request is as per Brian's request on the DRC forums)
